using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;

namespace ConsoleApplication1
{
    class Program
    {
        static void Main(string[] args)
        {

            int p = int.Parse(Console.ReadLine());

            Console.WriteLine((p / 4) * (p / 4));

            Console.ReadLine();
        }
    }
}
